bug.author: agentfeux
bug.description:
Hi, I'm getting wierd texture glitch after a while when training. The rotor just move from their initial position like this: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/40972980/93003304-7e433300-f50b-11ea-90ed-4933a1bdf66c.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/40972980/93003317-a6cb2d00-f50b-11ea-9f43-a64150067f82.png></denchmark-link>
When training, after each episode i am mostly using client.reset() and client.simSetVehiclePose(pose,False) from the API.

comments.comment: Hi, this is a dup. of <denchmark-link:https://github.com/microsoft/AirSim/issues/784>#784</denchmark-link> . Thank you for the feedback
